Load in the required dataset and libraries. Also get the first few rows of the data. 

```{r}
library(readr)
exam <- read.csv("exams.csv")
head(exam)
```

Building the model here. 

```{r}
model <- lm(math.score ~ parental.level.of.education + test.preparation.course, data = exam)
summary(model)
```
Interpreting the model

```{r}
summary(model)$coefficient
```
Confidence interval

```{r}
confint(model)
```

Error rate

```{r}
sigma(model)/mean(exam$math.score)
```
